text: Pavlovci () is a village located in the municipality of Ruma, Vojvodina, Serbia. As of 2011 census, it has a population of 393 inhabitants. ==Name== The name of the town in Serbian is in the plural, and therefore it is grammatically correct to refer to it as "Pavlovci are" instead of "Pavlovci is". A hypothetical singular version of the name would be Pavlovac. ==See also== * List of places in Serbia * List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina ==References== Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Pavlovci, Serbia
